sentences.sentence: I had another spontaneous miscarriage at around the 16th to 18th week.
sentences.translation: 在大约第16至18周时我又一次自然流产了。

sentences.sentence: The audience burst into spontaneous applause.
"Now my extroverted behaviour is spontaneous," he says.
sentences.translation: “现在我的外向行为是自发的。”他说。
